Some Lesser Known Facts About Nikkhil Chaddha

Does Nikkhil Chaddha smoke?: Not known

Does Nikkhil Chaddha drink alcohol?: Not known

Nikkhil Chaddha’s Parents got separated when he was just six months old.

Before becoming an actor, he was working as a cabin crew in Jet Airways.

He was into modeling at first, but his mother wanted him to become an actor.

Since Nikkhil Chaddha is an introvert, he wanted to “open up” for acting, so he joined theater in Delhi where he got to know that he was more interested in acting than modeling. So he moved to Mumbai to try his luck in acting.

In 2015, Nikkhil Chaddha changed his name to Reyansh Bhatia, as Reyansh was his birth name and Bhatia his mother’s maiden name. The reason being he hated his father for leaving his mother, but later he got to know the “real reason” for separation, so he again reverted to his original surname Chaddha after the death of his father.
